abstract: Disney Imagicademy will release a line of apps dealing with math, science, language arts and other topics and featuring its well-known characters.
snippet: Disney Imagicademy will release a line of apps dealing with math, science, language arts and other topics and featuring its well-known characters.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Disney is making a new push into an area that it has at times found tricky: making money by trying to make children smarter.

headline.main: Disney to Introduce New Apps Focused on Learning
